DOC.detailed_description: The study design demonstrate value iPro2 real-world diabetes management type 2 patient India . It interventional post-market , prospective , multi-center study data review perform 30 subject complete trial . During course study , patient undergo two iPro2 evaluation : - First iPro2 test ( Visit 1 [ application ] & 2 [ removal ] ) - Second iPro2 test ( Visit 3 [ application ] & 4 [ removal ] ) Patient HCP questionnaire administer Visit 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 5 . These questionnaire aim assess impact iPro2 evaluation physician understanding patient 's metabolic fluctuation support therapeutic intervention . They also investigate subject understand ( pre & post iPro2 evaluation ) concept glycemic variability importance compliance HCP recommendation .
